message: I'll take 999999 and leave you with 1. Let's get this over with.
Let's split it down the middle, a fair start to the game
Still a lot of money for you. I'm not budging much.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a bigger share
I'm still not giving up much, but it's getting down to the wire.
I'm getting closer to my target, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're running out of time.  This is my final offer.
I'm not giving in yet, I'll give you a tiny bit, but I want most of it
I'm getting impatient. Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to give in, I want most of it, but I'll give you a tiny bit
This is it, Bob. One more round and we both get nothing.
I'm not going to give in, I want most of it, and I'll give you just a tiny bit
